title: The Christmas Wedding
description: Seth McMasters went away in the middle of the night 8 years ago, and Mary Anne Walters never forgot him.After years of being apart, and dreaming of one day meeting again, Mary Anne runs into Seth at his old childhood home, and that’s where a few sparks are lit…until he realizes that they can never be together.But why?The Christmas Wedding is a journey of love, friendship and honor, and will surely brighten up your life during any season.From Amazon Bestselling Author, Danielle Lee ZwisslerHoliday Romance Best Selling AuthorHER LAST CHANCESeth McMasters went away in the middle of the night 8 years ago, and Mary Anne Walters never forgot him.After years of being apart, and dreaming of one day meeting again, Mary Anne runs into Seth at his old childhood home, and that’s where a few sparks are lit…until he realizes that they can never be together.The Holiday Romance Collection TwoBook 1: A Baby This ChristmasBook 2: The Christmas WeddingBook 3: The Christmas CatchBook 4: When Then Snow Melts
author: Danielle Lee Zwissler
